channel.title: coding on Life Problems
channel.description: Recent content in coding on Life Problems

item.title: Reminiscing Windows
item.description: I haven’t used any Microsoft product since I came to the US. I fleetingly toyed with the idea of using Windows 10 but having seen the glory days of Windows 98 I just could not tolerate this monstrosity. I stumbled upon this article about the silent resurgence of Microsoft as the world’s most valuable company and the article for some reason made me a tad bit happy. Growing up in India, Apple was not a concept I was even vaguely aware of.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I spent the entire day today configuring Hugo so that I can write a blog. The alternative was of course using the free, efficient, easy to use, readily configurable blog sites. What be life without a little pain? In my college I owned a shitty Acer laptop with an utterly useless battery and a cooling system so bad that the fan would act as a noise cancelling device for the din outside.
